mojo.description: Cleans up the ${iib.workspace} directory. Build errors will appear in the IIB Toolkit if .msgflow files are left under the ${iib.workspace} - the path determines the Namespace of the flow and that certainly won't match the original directory structure.

parameter.name: debugWorkspace
parameter.description: set to true to disable the workspace cleaning

parameter.name: workspace
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects were created.

mojo.description:
Creates a .bar file from a iib-bar Project.
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md

parameter.name: barName
parameter.description: The name of the BAR (compressed file format) archive file where the result is stored.

parameter.name: cleanBuild
parameter.description: Refreshes the projects in the workspace and then invokes a clean build before new items are added to the BAR file.

parameter.name: createBarTraceFile
parameter.description: The name of the trace file to use when creating bar files

parameter.name: deployAsSource
parameter.description: Include "-deployAsSource" parameter?

parameter.name: discardJarsPattern
parameter.description: Pattern (or patterns, comma separated) of jars to be excluded from the generated bar file

parameter.name: esql21
parameter.description: Compile ESQL for brokers at Version 2.1 of the product.

parameter.name: excludeArtifactsPattern
parameter.description: Exclude artifacts pattern (or patterns, comma separated). By default, exclude pom.xml's as each project will have one and this causes a packaging error.

parameter.name: includeArtifactsPattern
parameter.description: Include artifacts pattern (or patterns, comma separated). By default, the default value used for mqsipackagebar, except .esql & .subflow, which as not compilable

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: projectName
parameter.description: Projects containing files to include in the BAR file in the workspace. Required for a new workspace. A new workspace is a system folder which don't contain a .metadata folder.

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

parameter.name: skipWSErrorCheck
parameter.description: Whether classloaders are in use with this bar

parameter.name: toolkitInstallDir
parameter.description: Installation directory of the IIB Toolkit

parameter.name: toolkitVersion
parameter.description: Major Version number of the IIB Toolkit. (Current not used, but will be needed when support for difference Versions with different options is supported)

parameter.name: useClassloaders
parameter.description: Whether classloaders are in use with this bar

parameter.name: versionString
parameter.description: Appends the _ (underscore) character and the value of VersionString to the names of the compiled versions of the message flows (.cmf) files added to the BAR file, before the file extension.

parameter.name: workspace
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects are extracted to be built.

mojo.description:
Display help information on iib-maven-plugin.
Call mvn iib:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description:
Creates a .zip file from a iib-classloader Project which contains the
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md

parameter.name: buildAssemblyFile
parameter.description: The path to write the assemblies/iib-bar-project.xml file to before invoking the maven-assembly-plugin.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

mojo.description:
Packages a WebSphere Message Broker Project.
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md

parameter.name: buildAssemblyFile
parameter.description: The path to write the assemblies/iib-src-project.xml file to before invoking the maven-assembly-plugin.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

mojo.description:
Creates a .zip file from a iib-classloader Project which contains the
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md

parameter.name: project

mojo.description:
Unpacks the dependent WebSphere Message Broker Projects.
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
requiresDependencyResolution below is required for the unpack-dependencies goal to work correctly. See https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/issues/3

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

parameter.name: unpackDependenciesDirectory
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects will be unpacked.

parameter.name: workspace
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects are extracted to be built.

mojo.description:
Copies the dependencies into a directory for packaging later
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
requiresDependencyResolution below is required for the unpack-dependencies goal to work correctly. See https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/issues/3

parameter.name: classloaderPath
parameter.description: The path where the classloader jars will be copied to for packaging later.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

mojo.description:
Copies the dependencies into a directory for packaging later
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
requiresDependencyResolution below is required for the unpack-dependencies goal to work correctly. See https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/issues/3

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

mojo.description:
Unpacks the dependent WebSphere Message Broker Projects.
Implemented with help from: https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/blob/master/README.md
requiresDependencyResolution below is required for the unpack-dependencies goal to work correctly. See https://github.com/TimMoore/mojo-executor/issues/3

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

parameter.name: unpackDependenciesDirectory
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects will be unpacked.

parameter.name: workspace
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects are extracted to be built.

mojo.description: Goal which reads the default.properties file to figure out if the classloader approach for this bar project is consistent. Either all jar nodes in all flows must use a classloader or none of them should.

parameter.name: defaultPropertiesFile
parameter.description: The name of the default properties file to be generated from the bar file.

parameter.name: failOnInvalidClassloader
parameter.description: Whether or not to fail the build if the classloader approach is invalid.

parameter.name: useClassloaders
parameter.description: Whether classloaders are in use with this bar

mojo.description: Goal which reads the a bar file, including creating a list of configurable properties

parameter.name: applicationName
parameter.description: Projects containing files to include in the BAR file in the workspace. Required for a new workspace. A new workspace is a system folder which don't contain a .metadata folder. -- Added by Anand Awasthi

parameter.name: applyBarOverride
parameter.description: Whether the applybaroverride command should be executed or not

parameter.name: applyBarOverrideRecursively
parameter.description: Whether the applybaroverride command should be executed or not

parameter.name: applyBarOverrideTraceFile
parameter.description: The basename of the trace file to use when applybaroverriding bar files

parameter.name: barName
parameter.description: The name of the BAR (compressed file format) archive file where the result is stored.

parameter.name: configPropFileDirectory
parameter.description: The name of the directory where configurable properties files are stored -- Added by Anand Awasthi

parameter.name: defaultPropertiesFile
parameter.description: The name of the default properties file to be generated from the bar file.

parameter.name: failOnInvalidProperties
parameter.description: Whether or not to fail the build if properties are found to be invalid.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: session
parameter.description: The Maven Session Object

parameter.name: toolkitInstallDir
parameter.description: Installation directory of the IIB Toolkit

parameter.name: versionString
parameter.description: Appends the _ (underscore) character and the value of VersionString to the names of the compiled versions of the message flows (.cmf) files added to the BAR file, before the file extension.

parameter.name: workspace
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects are extracted to be built.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: The Maven Project Object

parameter.name: workspace
parameter.description: The path of the workspace in which the projects were created.
